Kyle is an exceptional CTO and generally is very savvy at working with and managing diverse personalities. He can be counted on to deliver an exceptional work product in stressful environments. At Torrent he has taken a technology team spread out in multiple locations and has increased their productivity and quality of work. This is not easy given that we have only been "live" for about four months dealing with clients who expect perfect customer service at all times. He has kept them quite happy thus achieveing one of many objectives outlined for him.

summary: A very experienced Technical PM and Dev Manager  who cut code for years.Having been responsible for the complete development cycle including requirements gathering, architecting, and coding, I’ve implemented Agile practices 5 times for teams that were floundering. Mentoring 6 brand new developers from zero dev experience into top tier SDE's required teaching C, Visual Basic, and SQL. Leading teams for over 10 years, I've shipped projects from web services to full stack enterprise apps and commercial software for Visual Studio, Xbox, and more. The solutions have served millions of customers worldwide while I was directly responsible for production services to 200,000 customers on 3 continents.
name: Kyle Swinney
title: Making the cloud just work better.
